de.iabg.mesh
Interface MeshConnectionWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ASCIIMeshConnectionWriter, RigidMeshConnectionWriter
public interface MeshConnectionWriter

This interface declares basic functionality for writing a file containing geometric connection data, namely node connections. In general, the user should call setFirstMeshFile(java.io.File) and setLastMeshFile(java.io.File) so that the file data can also be written. The data can then be written by calling exportNodeConnections(de.iabg.mesh.NodeConnectionMatrix).

Version:
November 1, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

Method Detail

exportNodeConnections

void exportNodeConnections(NodeConnectionMatrix connections)
                           throws java.io.IOException
Writes the given node connections. This method should be called after setFirstMeshFile(java.io.File) and setLastMeshFile(java.io.File) so that the file data can also be written.

Parameters:
connections - the NodeConnectionMatrix to be written
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the file could not be written

setConnectionDegreesOfFreedom

void setConnectionDegreesOfFreedom(java.lang.String connectionDOF)
Internally saves the connected degrees of freedom to be written with any exported data.

Parameters:
connectionDOF - the connected degrees of freedom

setConnectionIdentifier

void setConnectionIdentifier(int connectionIdentifier)
Internally saves the first connection identifier to be written with any exported data.

Parameters:
connectionIdentifier - the first connection identifier

setConnectionType

void setConnectionType(java.lang.String connectionType)
Internally saves the connection type to be written with any exported data.

Parameters:
connectionType - the connection type

setFirstMeshFile

void setFirstMeshFile(java.io.File firstMeshFile)
Internally saves the file data to be written with any exported data.

Parameters:
firstMeshFile - the file of the First Mesh

setIndependentMesh

void setIndependentMesh(java.lang.String independentMesh)
Internally saves the independent mesh of the exported data.

Parameters:
independentMesh - the independent mesh

setLastMeshFile

void setLastMeshFile(java.io.File lastMeshFile)
Internally saves the file data to be written with any exported data.

Parameters:
lastMeshFile - the file of the Last Mesh
